ai-patthana8.37:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.37:1.1_0: Being committed to the mind, the mental processes don’t arise because of mental processes.
ai-patthana8.37:1.1_1: Being committed to the mental development of the mind, it doesn’t arise because of mental processes.
ai-patthana8.37:2.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-patthana8.37:3.1_0: For the sake of letting go of negligence ...
